metadata.name: No Greed Button Damage
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod will prevent you from taking damage from the [b]Greed Button[/b]. Instead of the damage you will lose [b]1 coin[/b]. [u]Note[/u]: if you don't have 1 or more coins you will receive the normal damage.
As secondary effects, you will be able to stop [b]Greed Mode Waves[/b] / [b]Greed Mode Timer[/b].
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] [b]Repentance[/b] (tested). [b]Afterbirth+[/b] ([u]not[/u] tested but it should works). This mod is [b]not[/b] compatible with other mods that use the callback MMC_ENTITY_TAKE_DMG to remove the Greed Button damage.
